mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.presc_date AS "prescDate", a.presc_no AS "prescNo", a.dispensary AS "dispensary", a.queue_id AS "queueId", a.status AS "status", a.patient_id AS "patientId", a.name AS "name", a.name_phonetic AS "namePhonetic", a.identity AS "identity", a.charge_type AS "chargeType", a.unit_in_contract AS "unitInContract", a.presc_type AS "prescType", a.presc_attr AS "prescAttr", a.presc_source AS "prescSource", a.repetition AS "repetition", a.costs AS "costs", a.payments AS "payments", a.ordered_by AS "orderedBy", a.prescribed_by AS "prescribedBy", a.entered_by AS "enteredBy", a.charge_indicator AS "chargeIndicator", a.rcpt_no AS "rcptNo", a.sex AS "sex", a.age AS "age", a.count_per_repetition AS "countPerRepetition", a.entered_datetime AS "enteredDatetime", a.dispensing_datetime AS "dispensingDatetime", a.memo AS "memo", a.dispensing_provider AS "dispensingProvider", a.discg_taking_indicator AS "discgTakingIndicator", a.doctor_user AS "doctorUser", a.decoction AS "decoction", a.dosage_each AS "dosageEach", a.verify_by AS "verifyBy", a.verified_datetime AS "verifiedDatetime", a.dispensation_by AS "dispensationBy", a.dispensation_date AS "dispensationDate", a.print_date_time AS "printDateTime", a.list_no AS "listNo", a.dispensary_sub AS "dispensarySub", a.flag AS "flag", a.clinic_no AS "clinicNo", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO drug_presc_master_temp( id, org_id, presc_date, presc_no, dispensary, queue_id, status, patient_id, name, name_phonetic, identity, charge_type, unit_in_contract, presc_type, presc_attr, presc_source, repetition, costs, payments, ordered_by, prescribed_by, entered_by, charge_indicator, rcpt_no, sex, age, count_per_repetition, entered_datetime, dispensing_datetime, memo, dispensing_provider, discg_taking_indicator, doctor_user, decoction, dosage_each, verify_by, verified_datetime, dispensation_by, dispensation_date, print_date_time, list_no, dispensary_sub, flag, clinic_no, create_date, create_by, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orgId}, #{prescDate}, #{prescNo}, #{dispensary}, #{queueId}, #{status}, #{patientId}, #{name}, #{namePhonetic}, #{identity}, #{chargeType}, #{unitInContract}, #{prescType}, #{prescAttr}, #{prescSource}, #{repetition}, #{costs}, #{payments}, #{orderedBy}, #{prescribedBy}, #{enteredBy}, #{chargeIndicator}, #{rcptNo}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{countPerRepetition}, #{enteredDatetime}, #{dispensingDatetime}, #{memo}, #{dispensingProvider}, #{discgTakingIndicator}, #{doctorUser}, #{decoction}, #{dosageEach}, #{verifyBy}, #{verifiedDatetime}, #{dispensationBy}, #{dispensationDate}, #{printDateTime}, #{listNo}, #{dispensarySub}, #{flag}, #{clinicNo}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE drug_presc_master_temp SET org_id = #{orgId}, presc_date = #{prescDate}, presc_no = #{prescNo}, dispensary = #{dispensary}, queue_id = #{queueId}, status = #{status}, patient_id = #{patientId}, name = #{name}, name_phonetic = #{namePhonetic}, identity = #{identity}, charge_type = #{chargeType}, unit_in_contract = #{unitInContract}, presc_type = #{prescType}, presc_attr = #{prescAttr}, presc_source = #{prescSource}, repetition = #{repetition}, costs = #{costs}, payments = #{payments}, ordered_by = #{orderedBy}, prescribed_by = #{prescribedBy}, entered_by = #{enteredBy}, charge_indicator = #{chargeIndicator}, rcpt_no = #{rcptNo}, sex = #{sex}, age = #{age}, count_per_repetition = #{countPerRepetition}, entered_datetime = #{enteredDatetime}, dispensing_datetime = #{dispensingDatetime}, memo = #{memo}, dispensing_provider = #{dispensingProvider}, discg_taking_indicator = #{discgTakingIndicator}, doctor_user = #{doctorUser}, decoction = #{decoction}, dosage_each = #{dosageEach}, verify_by = #{verifyBy}, verified_datetime = #{verifiedDatetime}, dispensation_by = #{dispensationBy}, dispensation_date = #{dispensationDate}, print_date_time = #{printDateTime}, list_no = #{listNo}, dispensary_sub = #{dispensarySub}, flag = #{flag}, clinic_no = #{clinicNo}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
